jobDescription: Job Description:Develop, maintain, test, and troubleshoot code for data products. This includes Database Development, ETL / Data Migration Development, and Big Data Development.Collaborate with technical and non-technical resources to solve issues and develop new functionality.Participate in Requirements Gathering and Analysis meetings with Team Members, Internal Customers, and Stakeholders.Education: At-least a Bachelors degree in computer science or engineeringYears of Experience:Junior level: 2~3 years experienceMid level: 3~6 years experienceSenior level: 6+ years experienceTechnology Experience:Strong SQL and TSQL experience with writing queries, joins, constraints, etc.Some ETL experience with any ETL tool, prefer SSISSome C# development experience and/or python experienceMust have experience using Microsoft products (SQL Server, SSIS, etc.)Concept Experience:Must understand these concepts: ETL, Data Modeling, Data DictionaryMust understand data architecture / development conceptsLeadershipLooking for people to own and run things and not just look for tasksMust be a self-starter, engineer at heart, loves to solve problemsNot afraid to use new/cutting edge technologies, can-do experienceLearning or leading discussions on technology, R&D;, hackathons, etc.PREFER TO HAVE EXPERIENCE IN:Microsoft AzureAzure Blob Storage, Azure Data Lake StoreHDInsight, Hadoop, Big Data, Hive, HBaseSQL Experience:SQL Experience with SQL Server 2012+, Azure SQL Database, Polybase (plus)NoSQL Experience (plus)Cosmos DB / Document DB, Azure Table Storage, JSON objectsBONUS:Experience in Financial Services / FinTech / Governance, Risk, and ComplianceExperience with unstructured / big dataBlockchainAnalytics, visualization, data science, machine learning, etc. - provided by DiceETL, SSIS, Python, SQL
